Articles.Content: Part One - I use a Fueling Rocket on a mission (one of many such missions) to refuel a Space Trucker in Mun orbit after it delivered its cargo. Will MechJeb work or will my rocket run out of fuel and float about? Will it crash into Kerbin killing...nobody as their seems to be no cities or populace to in fact threaten. Watch and see!

Part Two - I get a phone call and take out the audio for a minute while letting the MJ 2 do its thing. When I typed in Audio Recovered I meant Audio Removed. And yes, we make it to the Space Trucker. The pilot does not seem happy to see us.
